resources.string: Boss Bonanza! In this game, we are spinning drum! More same slots means higher winnings!
Bonus Wheel! Your reward will multiply by dropped amount. But if amount equals to 0, your reward will disappear
After collecting your reward, you have a chance to play a bonus game
Lottery. Find 3 same multipliers! You have total of 5 attempts, if you found them, your reward multiplies by amount of 3 same multipliers
Find 3 same multipliers! You have total of 5 attempts
